div.div: English: The civil ensign and flag of Belgium. It is identical to Image:Flag of Belgium.svg except that it has a 2:3 ratio, instead of 13:15.
Nederlands: De vlag van Belgi√´ in de verhouding 2:3, gebruikt als civiele vlag en de facto nationale vlag.

span.span: The source code of this SVG is valid.
This vector image was created with a text editor.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.i: This image of simple geometry is ineligible for copyright and therefore in the public domain, because it consists entirely of information that is common property and contains no original authorship.

div.div:
Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time. (newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)
Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current08:27, 27 June 2021900 √ó 600 (958 bytes)Kamran.nef (talk | contribs)colors from pantone.com
17:33, 22 January 2020900 √ó 600 (182 bytes)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Increased nominal dimensions. Optimized svg code with code cleanup and reduction. No other changes.
19:05, 9 November 2014450 √ó 300 (257 bytes)SiBr4 (talk | contribs)Fixed seam (noticeable at icon size) and added XML header
19:31, 3 May 2011450 √ó 300 (215 bytes)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Code
11:19, 3 May 2011797 √ó 531 (982 bytes)Evanc0912 (talk | contribs)Matching the colours with the official description issued by the Ministry of Interior of Belgium.
06:48, 9 March 2010450 √ó 300 (215 bytes)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Colors in Pantone, reduced code
08:43, 3 November 2009450 √ó 300 (431 bytes)Oreo Priest (talk | contribs)Match official colours (per Official Guide to Protocol in Belgium) to File:Flag of Belgium.svg
00:12, 30 December 2008900 √ó 600 (452 bytes)Denelson83 (talk | contribs)Harmonise colours with Image:Flag of Belgium.svg
19:15, 28 July 2007600 √ó 400 (455 bytes)Ms2ger (talk | contribs)Valid SVG
14:22, 7 September 2006600 √ó 400 (353 bytes)Madden (talk | contribs)recode, xml tag added
(newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)

div.p: View more global usage of this file.

This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details such as the timestamp may not fully reflect those of the original file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
